description:
Hi, I'm Wegic. I can help you create and modify websites by simple conversations.
  Let's chat in your preferred language and bring your ideas to life!
title: Wegic | The first AI web designer & developer by your side.
keywords: AI web designer,AI web developer,AI Web Designer & Developer,Wegic,website development,ideal website,web design assistants,web development assistants,chat with Wegic,web design AI,web development AI
introduction: Wegic is an AI-powered tool that allows users to build multi-page websites in as little as 90 seconds using the latest GPT-4o model from OpenAI. It is designed to simplify the web design and development process, making it accessible to everyone, even those without coding skills.
targetPeople: Individuals and businesses looking to create websites quickly and easily without coding skills
